item.title: Resume
item.description:
Download PDF

Imad HARIR

Data Engineer / Data Scientist
LinkedIn | GitHub
üìû +(212) 665 63 38 41 ‚úâÔ∏è harir.imad.2001@gmail.com
üìç Casablanca, Morocco 23 years old Driving License B

Summary

A recent graduate in computer engineering, passionate about Data Engineering, Data Science, Big Data, and Artificial Intelligence. With a strong academic background, relevant projects, and a Google Professional Data Engineer certification, I have developed deep skills in data analysis, predictive modeling, and creating innovative solutions. Looking for opportunities to apply my skills and contribute to cutting-edge projects.

Education

  • State Engineer in Computer Sciences
    The National School of Applied Sciences Berrechid (ENSA) | 2021 - 2024

  • University Diploma in Technology (DUT)
    Higher School of Technology, Agadir
    Major: Computer Engineering | 2019 - 2021

  • High School Diploma in Mathematical Sciences
    Al Khawarizmy Technical High School | 2019
    Honors: With Distinction

Experiences

Final-Year Project

National Office of Electricity, Casablanca | Feb - Jun 2024

  • Analyzed electricity consumption using advanced time series methods such as STL decomposition and Dickey-Fuller stationarity test.
  • Developed forecasting models using deep neural networks (LSTM, GRU) to improve prediction accuracy.

Application Internship

CBI, Casablanca | Jul - Aug 2023

  • Designed and developed an integrated project management solution using Power Platform.
  • Added features like an interactive Gantt chart, custom Power Apps components, and Power Automate automation to enhance operational efficiency.

Initiation Internship

Schneider Electric, Casablanca | Jul 2022

  • Deployed AudioCodes desktop phones.

Final-Year Internship

Kadir Distribution, Casablanca | Aug - Sep 2021

  • Developed an interface for managing different levels of studies in a school.

Projects

  • Amazon Book Scraper and Data Storage
    Developed an automated scraping pipeline to extract book information from Amazon, stored in a PostgreSQL database. The project used Google Cloud Composer (Apache Airflow) for data orchestration and daily ingestion.

  • Google Cloud Pub/Sub Infrastructure with Terraform
    Created real-time stock market data processing infrastructure on Google Cloud using Terraform for deployment. Managed Pub/Sub topics, Cloud Functions, storage buckets, and BigQuery for analysis.

  • Handwritten Digits Detection and Facial Mask Detection
    Trained models to detect individuals with or without masks using a large dataset, achieving accurate results.

  • Prediction of Used Car Prices with Gradient Boosting
    Developed a machine learning model using Gradient Boosting to predict used car prices. Encoded categorical variables and created new features, resulting in robust performance on both training and test sets.

Skills

  • Programming Languages: Python, Java, JavaScript, R
  • Libraries: Keras, TensorFlow, scikit-learn
  • Cloud: Google Cloud Platform (GCP)
  • Database Systems: MySQL, Oracle, IBM Db2, PostgreSQL, SQL Server, MongoDB, Cassandra
  • Query Languages: SQL, CQL
  • Operating Systems: Windows, Linux
  • Tools: Talend
  • BI Tools: Power BI, IBM Cognos Analytics
  • Frameworks and Tools: Apache Spark, Hadoop, Kafka, Airflow, Terraform
  • Design and Modeling: UML, Merise, BPMN

Languages

  • Arabic: Native
  • French: Fluent
  • English: Intermediate

Certificates

  • Google Professional Data Engineer
  • IBM Data Engineering
  • IBM Big Data and Spark

Strengths

  • Autonomy
  • Stress Management
  • Teamwork
